pages.text: The reaper has nothing on you when you're using the Death Protection Poppet.$(br2)Much like a Totem of Undying, this $(l:bewitchment:poppets/poppet_practice)Poppet$() will pull you from the edge of death once.$(br2)Death Protection Poppets do not work in $(l:bewitchment:tools/poppet_shelves)Poppet Shelves$().
